column1: complex_test_11,(TEST TARGETING) TEMP,,0,Reinforce your fleet with the right ships,"The enemy is approaching with a combined force of pre-dreadnoughts, old cruisers and torpedo boats. Will you spend your resources to construct a few pre-dreadnoughts or will you increase your numbers with more light ships?",,90:00,248000000,,"b1_germany_mission(1), ca_1_small_austria, ca_1_small_austria2",,"ca_1_small_austria2(1

column1: complex_test_14,(TEST RANGE),,0,Decide what kind of warship will become the main attack force,"The enemy fleet posseses two super dreadnoughts, a state of the art battlecruiser and numerous support ships. Will you build few strong battleships, some fast battlecruisers or maybe several more cheaper ships?",,70:00,2075000000,,"bb_4, bb_3, bb_2, bb_1, bc_2, ca_3, cl_3_straightbow_tall, dd_3",,,1915,"bb_4(1

column1: test_complex_test_5,TEST Destroyer Attack,0,,Attack convoy with a Destroyer Flotilla,Design a Destroyer Flotilla that can eliminate an enemy convoy and its escorts. column1: test_complex_test_19,TEST The Modern Battleship ,,0,Design a late tech battleship to fight versus a whole fleet,"Your goal is to design a battleship with superior fire control and gun technology in order to defeat a strong fleet of dreadnoughts, heavy cruisers and destroyers. column1: Test_New_Mission_2,TEST Numbers don't matter,,0,Create a task force of capital ships and attack a single but much more advanced battleship,"Your main adversary is a huge battleship with technologies of the 1940s. You will be outgunned, outperformed in every way, but you have the numbers! You must build several capital ships and try to sink this steel monster! Seven destroyers will be at your disposal and can give the final blow to the enemy battleship if you manage to slow it down with your heavy shell fire.",_GameTip_Battleship_Firing2,180:00,3197000000,kill(100
